body: We should probably think of a new way to find out whether we are on a Cray or not. I think on Cori /opt/cray/craype doesn't exist. Instead it's /opt/cray/pe. Quick fix is just to check /opt/cray but that still leaves the issue of whether we're on a Cray XC, Cray XK, etc.
title: Cray detect method doesn't work on Cori
